availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas D. Brothers (Fleming County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, merchant. Montgomery County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Brothers and Sally Brothers. Married to D. A. Brothers. Father o f Amanda Brothers, Williams Brothers, and Emma Brothers. Resident of Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Fleming County in 1863.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 1, p. 20. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Hillsboro, p. 3.
